required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial on Sequential Immunization of Recombinant COVID-19 Vaccine (CHO Cells) and Inactivated COVID-19 Vaccine (Vero Cells) in Population Aged 18 Years and Above
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial on Sequential Immunization of Recombinant COVID-19 Vaccine (CHO Cells) and Inactivated COVID-19 Vaccine (Vero Cells) in Population Aged 18 Years and Above

lead_sponsor.agency: National Vaccine and Serum Institute, China

collaborator.agency: China National Biotec Group Company Limited
Lanzhou Institute of Biological Products Co., Ltd

clinical_study.source: National Vaccine and Serum Institute, China

brief_summary.textblock: This is randomized, blinded and controlled design. Among the randomly selected subjects who have been vaccinated with two doses of Inactivated COVID-19 vaccine (Vero cell), based on a step-wise approach, the subjects will receive one dose of recombinant COVID-19 vaccine sequentially at different shedules of 1-3 months, 3-6 months and ≥ 6 months after two doses of vaccination, and the subjects vaccinated at different schedules will be randomly assigned to different sequential immunization groups. At the same time, each sequential immunization group will be matched with a control group with the inactivated COVID-19 vaccine (vero cells) as the booster dose.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence and serverity of any adverse reactions
The incidence and serverity of solicited adverse events
The incidence and serverity of solicited adverse reactions
The incidence and serverity of solicited adverse events
The incidence and severity of unsolicited adverse reactions

primary_outcome.time_frame: after vaccination and up to 6 months after full course of immunization
after vaccination and up to 6 months after full course of immunization

primary_outcome.measure: GMT of anti- SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
GMT of anti- SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
4-fold rise of anti- SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
4-fold rise of anti- SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody

secondary_outcome.measure: 4-fold rise of anti- SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
4-fold rise of anti- SARS-CoV-2 neutralizing antibody
Proportion of neutralizing antibody titer ≥ 1: 16, ≥ 1: 32 and ≥ 1: 64
Proportion of neutralizing antibody titer ≥ 1: 16, ≥ 1: 32 and ≥ 1: 64

other_outcome.measure: The vaccine efficay of recombinant COVID-19 vaccine (CHO cells) against COVID-19, severe cases and deaths

other_outcome.time_frame: 3th month, 6th month, 9th month and 12th month after full course of immunization
3th month, 6th month, 9th month and 12th month after full course of immunization

other_outcome.measure: Proportion of neutralizing antibody titer ≥ 1: 16, ≥ 1: 32 and ≥ 1: 64
